frameDefinitions: The Self_mover, a living being, moves under its own direction along a Path.
These words refer to separating a Whole into Parts, or separating one part from another.
A Protagonist has made a Commitment but does not honor it, thereby doing harm to an Affected_party.
This frame consists of LUs which denote a Theme ceasing motion.
An Employee voluntarily leaves the service of an Employer.

An individual that is scheduled to be a Participant, or already is a Participant in an Activity or an Organization, indicates that  they will no not or no longer participate in that Activity or Organization.
frameExamples: She <t>walked</t> along the road for a while.
I <t>divided</t> the class into groups in alphabetical order .
My buddy Tom's girlfriend <t>backed out</t> of going to the show with me.
Peter <t>stopped</t> immediately and span to see Aeryn frozen where she stood.
Leah <t>quit</t> her job after one month because of an evil force.
The Moslem contingent had <t>withdrawn</t> from the EC talks on May 27.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Self_mover</fen> is the living being which moves under its own power. Normally it is expressed as an external argument.

<fen>Source</fen> is used for any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion.
In prepositional phrases, the prepositional object expresses the starting point of motion.  With particles, the starting point of motion is understood from context.
<fen>Path</fen> is used for any description of a trajectory of motion which is neither a <fen>Source</fen> nor a <fen>Goal</fen>.  This includes 'middle of path'' expressions.
<fen>Goal</fen> is used for any expression which tells where the <fen>Self_mover</fen> ends up as a result of the motion.

<fen>Area</fen> is used for expressions which describe a general area in which motion takes place when the motion is understood to be irregular and not to consist of a single linear path.  Note that this role should not be used for cases when the same phrase could be used with the same meaning with a non-motion target, since these should be annotated with the <fen>Place</fen> FE.
The direction that the <fen>Self_mover</fen> heads in during the motion.
The time when the motion occurs.

The <fen>Place</fen> is the location within which a defined motion takes place.  Any specified or implied  <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen> should designate a location contained with the <fen>Place</fen>.  This role can be differentiated from <fen>Area</fen> by the fact that the annotated phrase can be used in the same meaning with non-motion targets.
The <fen>Whole</fen> is a single entity or an aggregate of entities which is separated into <fen>Parts</fen>.  It is usually the NP Object of a target verb.
This refers collectively to the Parts resulting from separation of a Whole:
Part-1 is the first of two Parts mentioned. This is most often the Object of a verb.
<fen>Part_2</fen> is the second of two <fen>Parts</fen> mentioned. This is usually a PP Complement. First,
With causative uses of these verbs, an Agent separates or divides something.  The Agent is usually expressed as the External Argument:
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-agent that brings about the separation.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the separation occurs.
Where the separation occurs.
The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the person who has committed themselves to do something and later does not follow through on it.
The individual or group to whom the <fen>Protagonist</fen> had made the <fen>Commitment</fen> and who is negatively affected by the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s not honoring the <fen>Commitment</fen>.
An expression of the commitment that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has taken on earlier and which they fail to follow through on.
The time period during which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> fails to honor their commitment.
The location in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>  fails to honor the commitment they made.
This role identifies <fen>Theme</fen> whose motion ceases.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Theme</fen> stops.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Theme</fen>'s motion stops.
The person who is obligated to perform some task in order to receive compensation.
The person (or institution) in whose employ  the <fen>Employee</fen> stood.
The Field that one works in.
The label given to a particular type of service that the employer quits.
This role identifies the Time when an <fen>Employee</fen> quits the employment of the <fen>Employer</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Employee</fen> quits the employment of the <fen>Employer</fen>.
The individual or individuals that are engaged or are scheduled to be engaged in an <fen>Activity</fen>.
The event that the Participant is engaged in or was scheduled to be engaged in.
The <fen>Organization</fen> is an intentionally formed human social group with some definite structure to which the <fen>Participant</fen> belongs.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Participant ends their participation in the Activity.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Participant ends the participation in the Activity.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Fred</fex> crawled the narrow passage.
The cat ran <fex>out of the house</fex>.
The scouts hiked <fex>through the desert</fex>.
The children skipped <fex>into the park</fex>.
The mouse scurried <fex>about</fex>.
You should walk <fex>south</fex> about a block .
The hitchhikers walked <fex>in the middle of the road</fex>.
The directors split <fex>the company</fex> in two.
The directors split the company <fex>in two</fex>.
First, separate <fex>the yolks</fex> from the whites.
separate the yolks <fex>from the whites</fex>.
<fex>The researcher</fex> divided subjects into groups.
I divided the prize money among the winners <fex>that night</fex>.
You should separate the yolks from the whites <fex>over the sink</fex>.
The human rights situation is infinitely better now than under the Taliban, but <fex>the Bush administration</fex> has reneged on its pledge of a new Marshall Plan.
Two people backed out <fex>on me</fex> a few days earlier.
It appears that Schwarzenegger will renege <fex>on an agreement he made with teachers</fex>.
When a host city backed out <fex>at the last minute</fex> and Russellville, Ark., landed the opportunity to host the Babe Ruth 16-Year-Old World Series.

But his efforts came to nought when 18 of the 19 accused were bailed out as most
witnesses backed out <fex>in court</fex>.
When the kitty was standing beside the slayer's pillow, <fex>she</fex> stopped to make sure everything was quiet
John stopped <fex>suddenly</fex>, whirled around and spread out his arms
She stopped <fex>on the threshold</fex> with a sinking heart
<fex>I</fex> just quit yesterday!

He might quit <fex>showbusiness</fex> for years.
I  quit <fex>as a professional player</fex>!
Guess who just quit <fex>today</fex>!
Actually Iquit <fex>in the lobby</fex> before I got to my office.
Instead, <fex>he</fex> was challenged by Neil Gaudry, and withdrew from the race when it appeared that he would not be victorious.
In any event , in mid-April he withdrew <fex>from the contest</fex>.
